smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: this.activity cannot be safely cast to AppIntroActivity.
firstDay.clone() cannot be safely cast to Calendar.
this.activity cannot be safely cast to MainActivity.
currentDay.clone() cannot be safely cast to Calendar.
date.clone() cannot be safely cast to Calendar.
this.activity cannot be safely cast to Activity.
this.getSystemService(Context.ALARM_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to AlarmManager.
cycleStart.clone() cannot be safely cast to Calendar.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: com.xwray.groupie.kotlinandroidextensions.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
org.acra.annotation.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: MayBeConst
smells.description: Reports vals that can be const val instead.

instances.message: SELECT_RESTORE_FILE_TAG can be a `const val`.

smells.name: UnusedImports
smells.description: Unused Imports are dead code and should be removed.

instances.message: The import 'android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView' is unused.
The import 'devs.mulham.horizontalcalendar.utils.Utils' is unused.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (year.toLong() * 10000) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: year.toLong() * 10000
Parentheses in (month.toLong() * 100) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: month.toLong() * 100
